tool_description:
IDfy’s Driving License OCR API enables your customers to pre-fill their onboarding forms instantly, by letting them upload or scan a Driving License – IDfy will digitize the document for you!

When paired with IDfy’s DL Verification API, you can make your onboarding journey seamless and instant, by onboarding customers using just their DL card image – IDfy will handle both digitization and verification!
name: Driving License OCR
title: Driving License OCR

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.
